Sentence: Ukrainian forces engaged Russian troops near the Kharkiv border.
Russian artillery units launched strikes on Ukrainian positions east of Kharkiv.
Ukrainian drone operators conducted a reconnaissance mission across the border.
A Russian armored convoy advanced toward the Sumy region.
Ukrainian air defense units intercepted incoming missiles over Chernihiv.
Russian forces fortified border checkpoints along Belgorod.
Ukrainian special forces carried out a night raid on a Russian supply depot.
Russian helicopters patrolled border areas near Kursk.
Ukrainian forces retook a border village after a brief skirmish.
Russian military engineers constructed defensive trenches near the border.
